hero.title: Custom 3D Printed Products, Made to Your Exact Specifications
hero.subtitle: Configure parametric designs in real-time. See instant 3D preview. Place your order and receive the finished printed part.

features.heading: Why Choose Our Platform
features.subheading: Everything you need to get the perfect custom part

parametric.title: Fully Parametric
parametric.description: Adjust every dimension to your exact specifications. No compromises, no standard sizesâ€”just the perfect fit for your needs.

browserBased.title: No Software Required
browserBased.description: Works entirely in your browser. No downloads, no plugins, no installation. Just open and start designing.

realtime.title: Real-Time 3D Preview
realtime.description: See your customized product instantly rendered in 3D. What you see is exactly what you get.

ordering.title: Seamless Ordering
ordering.description: Configure your product, place your order, and receive the finished printed part delivered to your door.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.subheading: From configuration to delivery in three simple steps

step1.title: Configure Your Product
step1.description: Use intuitive sliders to adjust every parameter. See validation feedback in real-time to ensure your design is printable.
step1.feature1: Adjust all dimensions with precision sliders
step1.feature3: See exact measurements as you customize

step2.title: Preview in 3D
step2.description: Watch your custom product render instantly in high-quality 3D. Rotate, zoom, and inspect from every angle.

step3.title: Order & Receive
step3.description: Place your order and we handle the rest. Your custom part will be 3D printed and shipped directly to you.

productShowcase.heading: Available Products
productShowcase.subheading: Each product is fully customizable to your exact requirements

cta.heading: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subheading: Join customers who are already creating custom products tailored to their exact needs.

hoseAdapter.name: Vacuum Hose Adapter
hoseAdapter.shortDescription: Custom diameter vacuum hose adapter for any size connection

metadata.title: Vacuum Hose Adapter - Parametric 3D Editor
metadata.description: Configure and export custom vacuum hose adapters

innerDiameter.label: Small End Diameter
innerDiameter.help: Inner diameter of the smaller hose connection

outerDiameter.label: Large End Diameter
outerDiameter.help: Inner diameter of the larger hose connection

taperLength.label: Taper Length
taperLength.help: Length of the tapered transition between diameters

ridgeCount.label: Ridge Count
ridgeCount.help: Number of grip ridges on each end (0 for smooth)

ridgeDepth.label: Ridge Depth
ridgeDepth.help: Depth of grip ridges (only applies if ridge count > 0)

drainStrainer.name: Custom Drain Strainer
drainStrainer.shortDescription: Customizable sink drain strainer with perforated drainage holes

metadata.title: Custom Drain Strainer - Parametric 3D Editor
metadata.description: Configure and export custom drain strainers

diameter.label: Overall Diameter
diameter.help: Total diameter of the strainer to fit your drain

depth.label: Basket Depth
depth.help: How deep the strainer basket extends into the drain

rimHeight.label: Rim Height
rimHeight.help: Height of the flat rim that sits on top of the drain

wallThickness.label: Wall Thickness
wallThickness.help: Thickness of the strainer walls and rim

holeRows.label: Hole Rows
holeRows.help: Number of concentric circular rows of holes

holesPerRow.label: Holes Per Row
holesPerRow.help: Approximate number of holes in each row

centerPost.label: Center Post Height
centerPost.help: Height of center post for easy removal (0 = no post)

hoseAdapter.outerGreaterThanInner: Outer diameter must be greater than inner diameter
hoseAdapter.outerAtLeast2mmLarger: Outer diameter must be at least 2mm larger than inner diameter
hoseAdapter.taperTooLong: Taper length must be at most {maxTaperLength}mm (total length minus {minEndLengthTotal}mm for ends)
hoseAdapter.wallThicknessTooLarge: Wall thickness cannot exceed {maxWallThickness}mm (half of inner diameter)
hoseAdapter.wallThicknessTooSmall: Wall thickness must be at least 1mm for structural integrity
hoseAdapter.tooManyRidges: Too many ridges for the available space. Maximum {maxRidges} ridges
hoseAdapter.ridgeDepthExceedsWall: Ridge depth should not exceed wall thickness

drainStrainer.holeTooLargeForDiameter: Hole diameter is too large for the strainer diameter
drainStrainer.holeDiameterExcessive: Hole diameter should not exceed 1/4 of strainer diameter
drainStrainer.centerPostTooTall: Center post height should not exceed twice the basket depth
drainStrainer.rimHeightExceedsDepth: Rim height should not exceed basket depth
drainStrainer.tooManyHoleRows: Too many hole rows for strainer size - reduce rows or hole diameter
